content: knitted winter leaf knitting pattern by strickvogel the knitted winter leaf is inspired by a holly leaf it knits up fast and can be used as an ornament to hang on christmas presents or as part of a garland you can add buttons or make small pompoms to imitate red berries construction the christmas leaf is knitted flat from the branch to the leaf tip without purling you knit in double-knitting it ensures that the knitted winter leaf looks good from both sides techniques long-tail cast-on double-knitting make one right m1r / make one left m1l knit two together k2tog /slip slip knit ssk bind-off needles 3 5 mm needles or whatever needle is recommended for your yarn yarn leftovers of dk or fingering yarns i tested the pattern with peer gynt by sandnes garn 50g = 91m i used around 2g for each leaf with a dk yarn the finished object measures 9 cm gauge 1 x 1 cm in double-knitting = 3 row x 3 stitches instagram strickvogel ravelry strikkevogel © 2023 strickvogel
